mapper.insert: insert into m_shop(idNo, shopName, shopAddr, shopPostCode, contact1, contact2) values(#{idNo}, #{shopName}, #{shopAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopPostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact1}, #{contact2, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into m_history (historyNo, idNo, condition, memCode) values (seq_history.nextval, #{idNo}, '주니어상인', 'JUNIOR')
insert into m_history(historyNo, idNo, condition, memCode, reason) values(seq_history.nextval, #{idNo}, '탈퇴', 'SELLER', #{reason})
mapper.select: select TM.idNo, TM.emailAccount, TM.memName, TM.memAddr, TM.postCode, MS.shopName, MS.shopAddr, MS.contact1, MS.contact2, MS.shopPostCode, MSI.businessCode, MSI.businessRegFile, MSI.bank, MSI.bankAccount, MSI.thumbImg, MSI.backImg from t_member TM, m_shop MS, m_shop_info MSI where TM.idNo = MS.idNo and MS.idNo = MSI.idNo and TM.idNo = #{idNo}
mapper.delete: delete from m_dangol where memidNo=#{memidNo} AND shopName=#{shopName}
mapper.select: select rownum rn,d.memidNo, d.shopName,t.emailaccount from m_dangol d, t_member t where shopName=#{shopName} AND d.memidNo=t.idNo
select count(shopName) from m_dangol where shopName= #{shopName} group by (shopName)
